Hysteria:

Hysteria sighed deeply before turning to face Firearm:

"Well, despite how it may look, with enough help and round the clock work we 
could be up and running in about two weeks. But I haven't been able to 
survey all the damage yet."

Hysteria turned back to face the console, and continued talking to Firearm 
as she pulled up a half completed image of the CF's internal structure:

"There're a lot of internal problems, cut wires, broken links, you name it. 
First, however, I suggest we get the power core up and running again. It's 
barely hanging in there as it is. I'm estimating about 45-55% shipwide 
damage. But that's a very crude estimate, given what I've surveyed so far. 
For all we know the damage may not be as extensive as we think, though I 
seriously doubt that."
